{{also|Wollen}} ==Dutch== ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|nl|wol|en|id2=substance}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nl|/ˈʋɔlə(n)/}} * {{audio|nl|Nl-wollen.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|nl|wol|len}} * {{rhymes|nl|ɔlən}} ===Adjective=== {{nl-adj|-}} # [[woolen]], [[woollen]] ====Inflection==== {{nl-decl-adj||-|pred=-|part=-}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|af|wolle}} ---- ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvɔlən/}} * {{audio|de|De-wollen.ogg|audio}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wullīn}}, {{m|gmh|wüllīn}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wullīn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*wullīnaz|t=woolen}}, equivalent to {{af|de|Wolle|-en|pos=adjective}}. ====Adjective==== {{de-adj|-}} # [[woolen]], [[woollen]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj-notcomp|wollen}} ===Etymology 2=== From {{inh|de|gmh|wollen}}, {{m|gmh|wöllen}}, {{m|gmh|wullen}}, {{m|gmh|wellen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wollen}}, {{m|goh|wellen}}, from a blend of {{der|de|gem-pro|*wiljaną}} and {{m|gem-pro|*waljaną}}, ultimately from {{der|de|ine-pro|*welh₁-}}. Compare {{cog|nds|willen}}, {{cog|nl|willen}}, {{cog|en|will}}, {{cog|fy|wolle}}, {{cog|da|ville}}. See also {{m|de|wählen}}. ====Verb==== {{de-verb-irregular|will|wollte|[[wollen]]''' ''or'' '''[[gewollt]]}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive|past participle: “[[gewollt]]”}} To [[want]]; to [[wish]]; to [[desire]]; to [[demand]] #: {{ux|de|Ich '''will''' doch nur das Beste.|I '''want''' only the best.}} # {{lb|de|auxiliary|past participle: “[[wollen]]”}} To [[want]] (to do something). #: {{ux|de|Ich '''will''' gehen.|I want to go.|inline=y}} # {{lb|de|auxiliary|past participle: “[[wollen]]”}} To [[intend]], to [[mean]]. #: {{ux|de|Ich '''wollte''' dich nicht erschrecken.|I did not mean to scare you.|inline=y}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-auto|wollen}} [[Category:German modal verbs]] ---- ==Middle English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|enm|wollene|wolleyn|wollyn|wollun|wolland|wolen|wolyn|woullen|wullen|wullun|willene|wolnen|wullin}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|enm|ang|wyllen}}, with influence from {{m|enm|wolle}}, from {{inh|enm|gem-pro|*wullīnaz}}; thus equalling {{af|enm|wolle|-en}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|enm|/ˈwulən/}} ===Adjective=== {{enm-adj}} # Made of [[wool]] fibers or fabric spun therefrom. ====Descendants==== * {{desc|en|woollen}}, {{l|en|woolen}} * {{desc|sco|wollin}}, {{l|en|wolne}}, {{l|en|wowne}} ====References==== * {{R:MED Online|entry= wǒllen (adj.) |id=MED53346 |accessdate=1 May 2018}} * {{R:MED Online|entry= wǒlnen (adj.) |id=MED53352 |accessdate=2018-08-03}} ===Noun=== {{enm-noun|-}} # Woollen fabric; fabric made out of woollen thread. # Woollen clothing; woolwear or woolens. ====Descendants==== * {{desc|en|woollen}}, {{l|en|woolen}} * {{desc|sco|wollin}}, {{l|en|wolne}}, {{l|en|wowne}} ====References==== * {{R:MED Online|entry=wǒllen (n.) |id=MED53345 |accessdate=2018-08-03}} [[Category:enm:Clothing]] [[Category:enm:Fabrics]]
